overview: After aliens descend upon Earth, a contest is organized for the fate of our planet. The most important 2 out of three game of rock paper scissors is organized, until a stray fowl mid-game necessitated a postponing. Now, 75 years later, a young punk must use the help of the aging player from so long ago to save the world in a fateful game against a fearsome force from out of this world.
title: Roche, Papier, Oh Non!
